items.name: Gold Armour
items.location: Linkdood Gold Armor checks against any performance or security issues in the Windows Operating System. Additionally, provides protection to confidential documents in the system as well as outgoing documentas and also converts normal thumb drive into secured USB thumb drive.

items.name: Linkdood Secured USB
items.location: Linkdood Secured USB uses a customized file management system which provides the highest level of security to data. Linkdood Secured USBdelibers on the high data security demand from enterprises whilst being easy and convenient to use.
